Setup Your Machine!Â¶

Goal: All learners will have a consistent computing environment for the rest of the workshop.

Learners: For each technology below, install and setup on your machine.

Guides: When you verify the learner has completed install, give them a star!

  • 1. your computer
  • 2. gedit
  • 3. git, sshkeys, github
  • 4. python
  • 5. pip
  • 6. virtualenv
  • 7. django
